text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Julie received the following scores on 3 exams: 82,74 and 90.What score will Julie need to

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: receive on the next exam so that the average (mean) score for the 4 exams will be 85 ?

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;
text.tspan: Translating verbal descriptions into algebraic expressions is an essential initial step

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: --> If the square of the number x is multiplied by 7, and then 10 is added to that product,

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: --> If Jack’s present salary s is increased by 14 percent, then his new salary is 1.14s.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: the result can be represented by 7x² + 10

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: 1.Let x represent the score on Julie’s next exam.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: 2.Then in terms of x, the average of 4 exams is (82 + 74 + 90 + x )/4

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: 3.simplifying and setting it to 85 we have (82 + 74 + 90 + x )/4 = (246+ x )/ 4 = 85

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Courier new'; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: 4. x = 340 -246 = 94 => Julie has to score 94 on the next exam
